CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 29 reads: "Free Prizes, Samples and Demonstrations Galore...1. The Necchi-Elna Sewing Machine Attracted...many homemakers and was expertly demonstrated by Mrs. Arline Sturgeon of the Marnell and Company distributors..Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Arline Sturgeon seated at sewing machine in Marnell & Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
